title: Game of Thrones TV Club | S6:E2
description:
This is a free preview of Slate’s Game of Thrones podcast, a TV Club series that’s just for Slate Plus members. If you are not yet a member and would like to listen along as we recap each episode of the show’s sixth season, learn more at Slate.com/GameofThrones.
In this edition of the podcast, Dan Kois, Willa Paskin, and Mac Rogers recap Episode 2 of Season 6.
Previously: Episode 1

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
